reviews.review: i mean its ok i guess
Good and Bad game at the same time

see enemy, shoot enemy, deal 99 damage to enemy, die to enemy, 'cyka noob' in chat, go to bed crying, wake up in the morning feeling terrible because you got called a noob, try again, go into a comp game, get teamed with russians, they are angry for no reason, they call you 'english idiot', feel sad again, cry bit more, end of day still crying, go sleep to never wake up again. the end.
Melhor jogo de fps da história, porem a comunidade esta muito tóxica e sempre existirá xiters!
muito bom so precisa de menos hacks
wayyy to many hackers in game
Jogo muito bom, porem com um alto numero de hackers (cheaters)
Gyerekek! Meneküljetek. Beszippant és sosem enged el.
Cs é bom demais, porém está com muito xiter e isso deixa o jogo um pouco chato, a valve precisa dar mais atenção ao game!

Не рекомендую , есть множество объективных причин, не буду перечислять все
1 читеры, которые абсолютно в каждой катке
2 неадекватное комьюнинити игры 
3 не регистрируется урон по противникам 
4 64 тик рейт и отсутствие анти чита

Not really worth playing です. Too many people have used concentrated autism to hone their reflexes to inhuman levels. It's just not fun as a layman to get instadomed when you walk around a corner. Playing in the depths of the trench can be fun though.
Rusça öğrenmek ve sinir hastası olmak için vazgeçilmezim.
Я не буду рекомендовать данный продукт. На небе мне за это зачтётся
I grew up with this game, made friends and had a lot of fun. I’ve already spent a lot of money on the game, but I don’t regret it. :)
ogólnie gra spoko tylko te haxy
не рекомендую, отнимает нервные клетки и убивает психику
Valve ,если вы хотите, чтобы игра работала, уберите долбаный nuke с меню!!!!!!
Very good. Keep calm and speak russian
